title: Immune Boost Serum
description: Great during the winter season or around an office full of people during cold and flu season. A morning application of a couple of drops under your jawline, on the throat and thymus area (center of chest) will keep you feeling like you have an immune enhanced edge. 15 ml
cleaned_text: Description Great during the winter season or around an office full of people during cold and flu season. A morning application of a couple of drops under your jawline, on the throat and thymus area (center of chest) will keep you feeling like you have an immune enhanced edge. 15 ml
